resources.string: Choose a language for call screen

It appears that ${dialer_app_name} is not installed.

Please install the latest version of ${dialer_app_name} from Google Play and try again.

You can also optionally join the ${dialer_app_name} Beta program using the button below.
${dialer_app_name} is not installed as a system app and therefore does not have the CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT permission.\nSome features, such as call recording, may not work.

The patches applied by ${app_name} survive the updates of application ${dialer_app_name} over time, even after uninstalling the app.
Mods are therefore to be considered permanent, but they can be easily reverted using the "${revert_mods}" feature.
There is no need to keep this app installed after applying the desired changes.

After applying changes, you may need to forcibly reopen and close the ${dialer_app_name} app a couple of times before they take effect.
If you think you\'ve found any bugs please open an issue on Github
A new version of ${app_name} is available.\n\nYou can download it from Github Releases page.
Phenotype DB does not appear to exist.\n\nInstall Google Play Services from Google Play and try again.
Do you really want to revert all mods applied by ${app_name}?
Press the button below to revert all mods applied by ${app_name}
Root access denied. Please allow root access.

${app_name} is an app that allows, using root privileges, to modify the values contained in the Google Play Services "Phenotype" database, thus altering the behavior of the ${dialer_app_name} app to unlock experimental or blocked features in some countries.
Always make sure you are using the latest Dialer beta version available on the Play Store, to take advantage of the latest features.
